statements: SELECT * FROM NutritionPlans;
SELECT plan_id, athlete_id, dietary_restrictions FROM NutritionPlans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, dietary_preferences FROM NutritionPlans WHERE plan_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM NutritionPlans WHERE dietary_restrictions LIKE '%vegetarian%';
SELECT athlete_id FROM NutritionPlans WHERE performance_goals = 'Weight Loss' ORDER BY athlete_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM NutritionPlans WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT plan_id, athlete_id, performance_goals FROM NutritionPlans WHERE dietary_restrictions = 'Vegan';
SELECT plan_id, athlete_id, dietary_restrictions FROM NutritionPlans WHERE performance_goals IN ('Gain Muscle', 'Lose Weight') ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT dietary_restrictions FROM NutritionPlans;
SELECT athlete_id, dietary_preferences FROM NutritionPlans WHERE performance_goals = 'Improve Endurance' ORDER BY athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT name, age FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT athlete_id, name, weight FROM athletes ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE dietary_restrictions @> ARRAY['vegetarian'];
SELECT athlete_id, name, performance_goals FROM athletes WHERE preferences @> ARRAY['low-carb'];
SELECT name, age, weight FROM athletes WHERE age > 25 AND weight < 70;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE dietary_restrictions @> ARRAY['gluten-free']::TEXT[];
SELECT athlete_id, plan_name, calories, protein, carbs, fats FROM nutrition_plans WHERE calories > 2000 AND protein > 100 AND carbs < 200;
SELECT name, age, weight, dietary_restrictions FROM athletes WHERE dietary_restrictions && ARRAY['vegetarian', 'low-carb']::TEXT[];
SELECT athlete_id, name, performance_goals FROM athletes WHERE performance_goals @> ARRAY['improve-endurance']::TEXT[];
SELECT * FROM NutritionPlans;
SELECT plan_id, dietary_restrictions FROM NutritionPlans WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, age, gender FROM Athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT meal_name, calories, protein_grams FROM Meals WHERE calories < 500;
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70;
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT meal_name, calories, protein_grams, carbs_grams, fat_grams FROM Meals WHERE calories < 500 ORDER BY meal_name ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, height, weight, age FROM Athletes WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT plan_id, dietary_restrictions, preferences, performance_goals FROM NutritionPlans WHERE performance_goals LIKE '%strength%' ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, age, gender, height, weight FROM Athletes WHERE age >= 20 AND weight BETWEEN 60 AND 70 ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes
SELECT athlete_name, performance_goals FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_id = 1
SELECT plan_name, plan_calories FROM NutritionPlans ORDER BY plan_calories DESC
SELECT restriction_name FROM DietaryRestrictions WHERE restriction_id < 5
SELECT preference_name FROM Preferences WHERE athlete_id = 3
SELECT athlete_name, performance_goals FROM Athletes WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM NutritionPlans WHERE plan_calories > 2000 ORDER BY plan_calories DESC
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM NutritionPlans WHERE athlete_id = 1
SELECT * FROM DietaryRestrictions WHERE restriction_name IN ('Vegetarian', 'Gluten-Free')
SELECT athlete_name, preference_name FROM Preferences JOIN Athletes ON Preferences.athlete_id = Athletes.athlete_id
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT name, age, height FROM Athletes WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT athlete_id, name, weight FROM Athletes ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM NutritionPlans WHERE calories > 2000;
SELECT athlete_id, plan_name, protein, carbs FROM NutritionPlans WHERE protein >= 100 AND carbs <= 50;
SELECT * FROM Athletes ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC, gender
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Athletes WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT athlete_id, name, age, height, weight FROM Athletes WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY height DESC
SELECT plan_name, calories, protein, carbs, fats FROM NutritionPlans WHERE athlete_id = 3 ORDER BY calories DESC
SELECT restriction_type, restriction_description FROM Restrictions WHERE athlete_id = 1
